content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSVAL
      operator: non_empty
    - name: TSVALCD
      operator: non_empty
    - name: TSVAL
      operator: is_not_unique_relationship
      value: TSVALCD
Core:
  Id: CORE-000152
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: When TSVAL and TSVALCD are populated, there must be a one-to-one relationship
  between TSVALCD and TSVAL
Outcome:
  Message: There is not a one-to-one relationship between TSVAL and TSVALCD
  Output Variables:
    - TSVAL
    - TSVALCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0265
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: This is the code of the term in TSVAL.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: When TSVAL and TSVALCD are populated, there must be a one-to-one relationship between TSVALCD and TSVAL

Outcome.Message: There is not a one-to-one relationship between TSVAL and TSVALCD

Citations.Cited_Guidance: This is the code of the term in TSVAL.
